original_text: Wherefore the well was called Beerlahairoi; behold, it is between Kadesh and Bered.
korean_text: 이러므로 그 샘을 브엘라해로이라 불렀으며 그것은 가데스와 베렛 사이에 있더라

sentences.original_text: Wherefore the well was called Beerlahairoi
behold, it is between Kadesh and Bered
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 그것은 가데스와 베렛 사이에 있느니라
